short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A plugin to rate and view ratings of recruiters on LinkedIn

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A plugin to rate and view ratings of recruiters on LinkedIn. You can quickly see if a recruiter is worth talking to based on other users interactions with that recruiter.

No more:
- Roles that are irrelevant for you
- Recruiters that spam you
- Recruiters that ghost you

Only interact with the genuine recruiters that have a track record of providing relevant and attractive job offers to candidates.
